resources.string: "sync jtx Board content with other applications like DAVx⁵"
This action deletes all selected entries (%1$d). Are you sure that you want to proceed? This operation cannot be undone!
"The first line is interpreted as summary, the rest as description. Hashtags are interpreted as categories (eg #category)."
"This entry is part of a series. Editing this entry will unlink it from the series, it will continue as a standalone event and changes on the original event will not affect this entry anymore."
"jtx Board needs the permission in order to record audio or use speech-to-text functionalities. Please grant the permission to use this feature."
"This item is an exception to a recurring entry."
"Are you sure you want to delete \"%1$s\"?"
"Add an attendee (e-mail-address). Attention: Servers might automatically process attendees e.g. by sending iMIP messages."
"Contact information of the responsible or owner of this entry"

"* Please note that attachments are considered an experimental feature. Currently only small attachments (up to 100 KB) can be exported as .ics and synchronized via DAVx⁵. If you encounter any issues, please let us know through the support forums or a support request on the website!"
"Recurrence requires a start-date to be set!"
"Are you sure you want to delete \"%1$s\"?"
"Are you sure you want to discard this entry? This entry will not be saved."
"The Due date cannot be before the Start date."
"jtx Board can suggest Attendee data based on your contacts as input values for your entries. Read Permissions on your contacts is needed to enable this feature."
"An unknown or unsupported recurrence rule was detected. If you save this entry, the existing recurrence rule will be deleted/overwritten."

"A duration was detected for this entry in the background. Handling a duration is currently not supported by jtx Board. Please use the start, due and end date instead. If you save this entry, the existing duration will be deleted."
"Special thanks to FFG for their trust and financial support to realize this project."
"Show subtasks of Journals and Notes in Tasklist"
"Show subnotes of Journals and Tasks in Noteslist"
"Show subjournals of Notes and Tasks in Journallist"

"jtx Board does not provide server-synchronisation itself, but supports synchronisation through DAVx⁵. This method allows you to use any compatible CalDAV-server of your choice to store, backup and syncrhonise your data. * Please note that this functionality is still considered as beta. Although this functionality has been tested, issues might still occur. If you encounter any problem, we would appreciate your feedback!"
"We have detected DAVx⁵ on your phone. If you haven't set up any accounts yet, please follow the instructions on our website:"
"We have detected DAVx⁵ on your phone. If you have any troubles or doubts, please check out our website first:"
"We have not detected DAVx⁵ on your phone. For more information about the Sync please see:"
"For more information about DAVx⁵ please check out"
"Failed opening DAVx⁵, please open the app manually."
"Triggering sync in DAVx⁵ failed, please check in DAVx⁵."

"Hey, I'm Patrick, the developer of jtx Board. I am putting a lot of time and effort into this app that I am offering to you for free. If you like my app, please send some love and make a small donation!"
"If you would like to consider any other donation method, please check our website:"
"No app was found to open this file/URL."
"Sorry, jtx is having a hard time to sync. Please close DAVx⁵ and start the sync again."

"jtx Board is an open source app that appreciates the participation and contribution of the open source community. On this page we would like to attribute the efforts of community members for translations."
"If you would like to edit/add translations or add new languages to this app, feel free to join the jtx Board project on the translation platform Crowdin:"
"Congratulations, this is your first journal entry :-)"

"Journals can be used to keep your notes for a specific date. Use this functionality for example for protocols, meeting minutes, diary entries and so on. If you edit this entry, you will see the options to add categories, attendees, attachments, … Feel free to delete this entry whenever you want!"
"Congratulations, this is your first note entry :-)"

"Notes are traditional notes and not bound to a dedicated date. Like journals you can add attachments, attendees and more when editing or adding an entry. By the way you can also add subtasks to any entry, no matter if it's a journal, note or task!"
"Congratulations, this is your first task entry :-)"

"Additionally to journals and notes, tasks can have a planned start, a due and a completed date. They can be checked when they are done or a progress can be set. Edit this entry to check out all options :-)"
"Add content to a journal, note or task?"
"Collections are an accumulation of entries like folders with files. You can create new local collections through the menu or you can set up new remote collections to synchronize through DAVx⁵."
"Deleting a collection will also delete all journals, notes and tasks within this collection. This cannot be undone. Are you sure that you want to continue?"
"Please choose a timezone for both, start and due, or deactivate timezones."
"An error occurred while exporting the selected collection."
"An error occurred while saving the selected file!"
"This entry is part of a series."
"Please note: Only writeable collections and collections with support for the same components (Journals, Notes, Tasks) can be selected."
"Please click on the collection to which the entry/entries should be added!"
"%1$d added, %2$d skipped. (Exclusive instances of recurring entries.)"
"An error occurred while exporting all collections."

"The development of an app is a complex topic and development, maintenance and support is hard work. If you like this app and if you would like to ensure continuous development, please consider a donation :-) Thank you!"

"The development of an app is a complex topic and development, maintenance and support is hard work. If you would like use the Pro functionalities or if you would like to support our project, please consider the following in-app purchase:"

"Thank you for considering jtx Board Pro. This upgrade enables editing capabilities for remote collections, quick-entries, quick-editing through long click and dynamic colors (available from Android 12)."
"Thank you for buying jtx Board Pro"
"This upgrade enables editing capabilities for remote collections, quick-entries, quick-editing through long click and dynamic colors (available from Android 12)."
"Thank you for buying jtx Board Pro!"
"Editing capabilities for remote collections, quick-entries, quick-editing through long click and dynamic colors (available from Android 12) are now enabled."
"Please purchase the Pro package to enable editing capabilities of remote collections."
"Hello! jtx Board comes with a standard and a Pro version. Please check out the \"Buy Pro\" section to find out more about jtx Board Pro! Thank you!"
"Please check your internet connection or try again later!"
"Please buy jtx Board Pro to enable editing capabilities for remote collections."
"Attention: Recurring instances must be unlinked from its series before being moved to another collection and will be ignored in this process."
"Choose the parent to which the selected entries should be linked as subtasks/linked notes."
"Choose the sub-entries that should be linked."
"Attention: Servers might automatically process attendees e.g. by sending iMIP messages."
"An unknown or unsupported recurrence rule was detected. If you continue, the existing recurrence rule will be deleted/overwritten."
"This entry was either deleted in the background or could not be loaded."

"* Synchronizing attachments is an experimental feature. We strongly encourage to use only small attachments (up to 100 KB) as larger ones could lead to long synchronization times and unexpected behaviour."
"This entry is part of a series. This entry will copy any changes made for the series."
"This entry is part of a series but was changed. This entry will not be affected by changes of the series."

"Attention: Series-elements mirror the subtasks and linked notes from the series. If you would like to change subtasks and linked notes only for a series-element, please unlink it from the series first."
"Remove the relation as a sub-entry? The entry will remain as a standalone entry."
"jtx Board shows notifications when alarms are due. Please grant the notifications permission in order to use this feature."
"jtx Board can use your location to automatically zoom to your location when using maps. Please grant the coarse location permission if you want to use this feature."
"This account could not be found in the account manager. Please delete if obsolete."
"Are you sure that you want to delete this account from jtx Board? All collections within this account will be removed. This operation cannot be undone."
"Please note that all changes are saved immediately."
"Unsaved changes detected. Would you like to save or discard your changes?"
"An error occurred while inserting/updating this entry. The entry or collection might not exist anymore."
"Are you sure you want to discard your changes and revert contents to the state before you started editing?"
"Attention: Subtasks and subnotes are separate entries and cannot be reverted."

"Detaching all elements will delete the series and turn the instances into independent entries that can have their own subtasks or linked notes. But there will be no more link to the original series or other instances. Would you like to continue?"
"Detaching this element from the series will allow you to have independent subtasks or linked notes, but there will be no more link to the original series. Would you like to continue?"
"Your current version of DAVx⁵ is not compatible with this version of jtx Board. Please update DAVx⁵ to 4.3.1 (403010000+) or later! The synchronization is currently suspended."
"Set a default start date for tasks"
"Set a default due date for tasks"
"Set the step for the progress slider"
"Please purchase the Pro package to enable this feature."
"No app found to send this entry."
"Show only one recurring entry in future"
"Turn on to automatically create alarms. Choose \"Always on due\" to not create an alarm but to get notified in any case when a task is due."
"This function hides the selected entries until they are unlockd with biometrics, but does not encrypt/decrypt data in the background."
"Attention: Instances of recurring entries are excluded!"
"Please add a local collection or synchronise a remote collection that supports this module."
"Grouping is available for list and compact view"
"Always show child-entries on top level in list"
"Show only one recurring entry in future"
"* Please note that jtx Board is using a new, experimental way to handle widgets which in rare cases might cause unexpected behaviour."
"Please purchase the Pro package to enable further configuration options."
"No entries found that match your filter criteria"
"Attention: Currently only one level of hierarchy is supported in the widget. In order to see the entries of lower levels, please use the flat view instead."
"Maximum number of entries in widget reached (%1$d)."
